actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Baucus, Committee on Finance, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 24. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
name: Christopher J. Meade
nominee: Christopher J. Meade, of New York, to be General Counsel for the Department of the Treasury
position: General Counsel for the Department of the Treasury
